text: Susan Theresa Burke is an American writer, actress and stand-up comic. She was born in Casper, Wyoming. She is known for co-writing the movie Smashed. The movie is about her life and comedic career while going through alcoholism. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Review of Smashed , Onion AV Club in 2012 Category:Actors from Wyoming Category:Writers from Wyoming Category:People from Casper, Wyoming Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American screenwriters Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Wyoming
title: Susan Theresa Burke
